languages.text: "Несомненно, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} о ваших деяниях достигла стен сего храма закона и воли Империума. И все же {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Лекс Империалис{/g}..." {n}Выражение лица Мастера Печатей переживает неописуемые метаморфозы — внутри нее борются сразу несколько душевных порывов, губы беззвучно шевелятся, и она кивает несколько раз самой себе.{/n}

"Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} о ваших деяниях достигла стен сего храма закона и воли Империума. И все же {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Лекс Империалис{/g}..." {n}Выражение лица Мастера Печатей переживает неописуемые метаморфозы — внутри нее борются сразу несколько душевных порывов, губы беззвучно шевелятся, и она кивает несколько раз самой себе.{/n}

Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “当然，你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}光荣事迹{/d}早已传到了帝国法律与意志的殿堂之中，然而，根据{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}帝国法典{/g}相关规定……”{n}印章大师脸上的表情不断地剧烈变化，各种各样的道德冲动在她心中天人交战。她的嘴唇无声地翕动着，随后点了几下头 。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然，你的光荣事迹早已传到了帝国法律与意志的殿堂之中，然而，根据{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}帝国法典{/g}相关规定……”{n}印章大师脸上的表情不断地剧烈变化，各种各样的道德冲动在她心中天人交战。她的嘴唇无声地翕动着，随后点了几下头 。{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Natürlich hat der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ruhm{/d} Eurer Taten die Wände dieses Tempels von Gesetz und Wille des Imperiums erreicht. Und doch ist das {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} ..." {n}Der Ausdruck auf dem Gesicht der Meisterin der Siegel durchläuft eine unbeschreibliche Metamorphose – verschiedene moralische Impulse ringen in ihrem Inneren miteinander, und ihre Lippen bewegen sich tonlos. Dann nickt sie sich mehrmals selbst zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich hat der Ruhm Eurer Taten die Wände dieses Tempels von Gesetz und Wille des Imperiums erreicht. Und doch ist das {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} ..." {n}Der Ausdruck auf dem Gesicht der Meisterin der Siegel durchläuft eine unbeschreibliche Metamorphose — verschiedene moralische Impulse ringen in ihrem Inneren miteinander, und ihre Lippen bewegen sich tonlos. Dann nickt sie sich mehrmals selbst zu.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}récits de vos exploits{/d} ont bien entendu atteint les murs de ce temple dédié à la loi et à la volonté de l'Imperium. Cependant, la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}... » {n}L'expression de la maîtresse des sceaux se métamorphose sous vos yeux alors qu'elle semble en proie à une crise de conscience. Elle agite les lèvres sans produire le moindre son pendant quelques instants, puis hoche la tête plusieurs fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les récits de vos exploits ont bien entendu atteint les murs de ce temple dédié à la loi et à la volonté de l'Imperium. Cependant, la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}... » {n}L'expression de la maîtresse des sceaux se métamorphose sous vos yeux alors qu'elle semble en proie à une crise de conscience. Elle agite les lèvres sans produire le moindre son pendant quelques instants, puis hoche la tête plusieurs fois.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Desde luego, la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fama{/d} de sus acciones ha llegado a los muros de este templo de la ley y la voluntad del Imperium. Pero la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} dicta...». {n}La expresión de la maestra de sellos atraviesa una metamorfosis indescriptible. En su interior hay varias normativas morales que se enfrentan, haciendo que mueva los labios sin llegar a hablar. Después, asiente varias veces para sí.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, la fama de sus acciones ha llegado a los muros de este templo de la ley y la voluntad del Imperium. Pero la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} dicta...». {n}La expresión de la maestra de sellos atraviesa una metamorfosis indescriptible. En su interior hay varias normativas morales que se enfrentan, haciendo que mueva los labios sin llegar a hablar. Después, asiente varias veces para sí.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「もちろん。陛下の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}行動{/d}は、帝国の法と意志の、神殿の壁にまで届いています。それにも関わらず、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア{/g}ときたら…」{n}印章長の表情が大きく変化した。様々な道徳的感情が彼女の中で交差している様で、唇は音もなく動いている。そして、彼女は自分に言い聞かせるように何度も頷いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん。陛下の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}行動{/d}は、帝国の法と意志の、神殿の壁にまで届いています。それにも関わらず、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア{/g}ときたら…」{n}印章長の表情が大きく変化した。様々な道徳的感情が彼女の中で交差している様で、唇は音もなく動いている。そして、彼女は自分に言い聞かせるように何度も頷いている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Elbette. İcraatlarınız sayesinde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}ününüz{/d}, İmparatorluk'un kanunları ve iradesini yansıtan bu tapınağın duvarlarına ulaştı. Ancak {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex İmperialis{/g}..." {n}Mühür Üstadı'nın yüz ifadesi, tarif edilemez bir değişimden geçiyor... Dudakları, kadının içinde birkaç farklı ahlaki dürtü çatışırcasına sessizce hareket ediyor. Ardından birkaç kez kendi kendine başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course, the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} of your deeds has reached the walls of this temple of the Imperium's law and will. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}..." {n}The expression on the Master of Seals's face undergoes an indescribable metamorphosis — various moral impulses are warring within her, her lips moving soundlessly. Then she nods several times to herself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. İcraatlarınız sayesinde ününüz, İmparatorluk'un kanunları ve iradesini yansıtan bu tapınağın duvarlarına ulaştı. Ancak {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex İmperialis{/g}..." {n}Mühür Üstadı'nın yüz ifadesi, tarif edilemez bir değişimden geçiyor... Dudakları, kadının içinde birkaç farklı ahlaki dürtü çatışırcasına sessizce hareket ediyor. Ardından birkaç kez kendi kendine başını sallıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
